Posts.Content:
You should really go see your doctor. I had awful pain in one breast and they found a lump. Thankfully it was due to an infection of some sort.
You really need to get it checked out.
Posts.Title: pain in one breast

Posts.Content: Has anyone found a lump that turned out to be a swollen lymphnode due to an infection of some sort?
Posts.Title: swollen lymphnodes infections?

Posts.Content: I went to my gp for constant pain in my breast. I felt no lumps whats so ever. She checked my breasts and refered me to a breast clinic. I find there that my Dr felt a lump, and that was why I was refered. Bit of a shock.
Posts.Title: Breast Lump + general + Pregnancy

Posts.Content:
I had a local during both biopsys but was not told of any risks to my pregnancy?
What risks are there? x
Thanks for everyone replying.
Posts.Title: Breast Lump + general + Pregnancy

Posts.Content:
They canceled my lump removal, and got me in today to have a 2nd biopsy. They took about
 15 odd samples instead of the 2 they took last time. 
Results on Thursday, but they said another surgoen is willing to do it with a local, but they would talk the risks with me if I need the lump removed.
Thank you for your reply x
Posts.Title: Breast Lump + general + Pregnancy
